item.description: Boston Millionaires and the Boston Music Awards Show Meet Up at the Liberty Hotel in Boston, Ma. for a night of fabulous Entertainment. The Awards show will honor the best of the best in music entertainment in the Boston Area. Boston Millionaires Clint and Robert Leger will be attending the Big Show together while taking a photo opp. and review of the nights festivities. This will be a terrific show and don't miss this once a year special event.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Clint to make plans to meet up.
item.name: Boston Music Awards Show Dec 5th at the Elegant Liberty Hotel
